Author: GGeorge
Title: [ANN][pre-ico]WeAre - Revolution in Helping Investors and Founders with ICO
Body: Full amount of projects and assets will be a property of all participants, but not small number of people and founders. WeAre is not just another blockchain or fund that provides token issue and projects supporting. It is a complete ecosystem, where success of each project increases portfolio value of all token holder. By this way all team leaders are interested in success of all projects and will provide all available help by advices or providing staff or funds for solving some issues.

Title: [ANN][pre-ico]WeAre - Revolution in Helping Investors and Founders with ICO
Body: We see as our clients:  Projects and teams who are interested in fast and fair funding for start of product development. Investors who used to invest into ICO and know main market’s problems. Investors who are interested in investing to ICO but haven’t done this before. Those who are afraid of possible scams from teams and lack of trustworthy information about projects. Customers can buy services and products for one universal WeAre token (inside ecosystem).

Author: johnwayne33
Title: [ANN][pre-ico]WeAre - Revolution in Helping Investors and Founders with ICO
Body: So, why a team should use the help of yours instead of making ICO by themself?

Author: GGeorge
Title: [ANN][pre-ico]WeAre - Revolution in Helping Investors and Founders with ICO
Body: 1. Support from community. Everyone is able to discuss and support projects on WeAre platform. There are no limits for discussion. By this way developers will get very useful feedback, which may be used for upgrading their product or concept.  2. Access to specialists of platforms. The specialists are representatives of other teams. It is common to provide help and support to each other.  3. Absence of bureaucracy and legal issues. WeAre provides best conditions for team’s and fund performance in legal area.  4. Informational support for projects. Teams no longer have a need to spend insane budgets for pointless bounty campaigns and compete for attention of audience.

Author: JaneAcker361
Title: [ANN][pre-ico]WeAre - Revolution in Helping Investors and Founders with ICO
Body: Do you plan to open offices?

Author: GGeorge
Title: [ANN][pre-ico]WeAre - Revolution in Helping Investors and Founders with ICO
Body: WeAre branches will be placed in biggest cities all over the world. Staff will be busy by WeAre token support and development. Also they will work on token’s stability and ecosystem. WeAre Foundation’s staff will support launched and finished ACO campaigns.  These specialists will provide management of fund, its usage and splitting. WeAre Foundation will consist of all team leaders of projects or their official representatives as a staff expert. These specialists will support projects, which have passed automatic filtering. Each branch will contain conference hall, auditoriums for beginners and founders.  WeAre Foundation will have coworking space for participants who are already in progress with their project. All needed staff, services and information will be collected in one place and anyone is able to use it. Participants could get private coaching and open lectures provided by specialists from their area. Also they will provide valuable recommendations about projects, which will improve quality and the project’s possibilities.

Author: Altaman
Title: [ANN][pre-ico]WeAre - Revolution in Helping Investors and Founders with ICO
Body: Hi! What is the usage of your token?

Author: GGeorge
Title: [ANN][pre-ico]WeAre - Revolution in Helping Investors and Founders with ICO
Body: Hi 1. Payment unit. By using WeAre token, all liquid assets are available for exchange: Bitcoin, Dash, Ethereum, Waves, etc.. Also customers and clients are free to use WeAre token for purchasing services and products inside the ecosystem. It is handy for all WeAre participants because the asset is stable, risks are decreased and the token may be used for purchases not only in one store of developer/project. Also token is an investment tool which grows in price and good for market exchange. 2. Reliable diversification tool. Token’s pricing directly related to amount of successful projects and sold services/products. It is a good asset supplied by real demand. Also security fund will hold token from market fluctuations. 3. Directly indicates success of projects. Good and promising projects because of sales will make influence on token’s quotations. Failure of one project will not make a big influence because success of other projects will cover it. 4. Additional Coin Offering will be available only in case, when would be projects for that (and smart-contracts as a result). With sometime inflation will be covered by sales.

Author: GGeorge
Title: [ANN][pre-ico]WeAre - Revolution in Helping Investors and Founders with ICO
Body: Our foundation is a group of people who are in charge of management of fund, its usage and splitting. WeAre Foundation will consist of all team leaders of projects or their official representatives as a staff expert. Main idea of WeAre Foundation is to promote WeAre token and to support new projects of the ecosystem. Profits of WeAre foundation depend directly on WeAre ecosystem.  By partnership we mean affiliation with other companies for mutual profit.

Author: GGeorge
Title: [ANN][pre-ico]WeAre - Revolution in Helping Investors and Founders with ICO
Body: As payment unit. By using WeAre token, all liquid assets are available for exchange: Bitcoin, Dash, Ethereum, Waves, etc.. Also customers and clients are free to use WeAre token for purchasing services and products inside the ecosystem. It is handy for all WeAre participants because the asset is stable, risks are decreased and the token may be used for purchases not only in one store of developer/project. Also token is an investment tool which grows in price and good for market exchange. As reliable diversification tool. Token’s pricing directly related to amount of successful projects and sold services/products. It is a good asset supplied by real demand. Also security fund will hold token from market fluctuations. Directly indicates success of projects. Good and promising projects because of sales will make influence on token’s quotations. Failure of one project will not make a big influence because success of other projects will cover it.

Author: GGeorge
Title: [ANN][pre-ico]WeAre - Revolution in Helping Investors and Founders with ICO
Body: Hi, On pre-sale we are using Ethereum blockchain but by the ICO we will make our own blockchain based on Hyperledger. Our token will also be a multichain token and it will be simultaneously on several networks.

Author: GGeorge
Title: [ANN][pre-ico]WeAre - Revolution in Helping Investors and Founders with ICO
Body: WeAre Foundation is a system with all team leaders of projects or their official representatives as a staff expert. These specialists will support projects, which have passed automatic filtering. Each branch will contain conference hall, auditoriums for beginners and founders.  WeAre Foundation will have coworking space for participants who are already in progress with their project. All needed staff, services and information will be collected in one place and anyone is able to use it. Participants could get private coaching and open lectures provided by specialists from their area. Also they will provide valuable recommendations about projects, which will improve quality and the project’s possibilities.

Title: [ANN][pre-ico]WeAre - Revolution in Helping Investors and Founders with ICO
Body: Hi, WeAre token doesn’t depend on success of one team and project (as it usually happens during regular ICO). In case one team faces failure, the decreased WeAre token pricing will be recovered by success of other projects. It’s important that WeAre token is universal for both funders and investors. Some extra tokens may be used by investors or other participants for purchasing products, services or other financial operations.

Author: GGeorge
Title: [ANN][pre-ico]WeAre - Revolution in Helping Investors and Founders with ICO
Body: Hi, Our foundation is a group of people who are in charge of management of fund, its usage and splitting. WeAre Foundation will consist of all team leaders of projects or their official representatives as a staff expert. Main idea of WeAre Foundation is to promote WeAre token and to support new projects of the ecosystem. Profits of WeAre foundation depend directly on WeAre ecosystem.  By partnership we mean affiliation with other companies for mutual profit.

Author: nazzzario
Title: [ANN][pre-ico]WeAre - Revolution in Helping Investors and Founders with ICO
Body: Hi, what is main idea of project?

Author: GGeorge
Title: [ANN][pre-ico]WeAre - Revolution in Helping Investors and Founders with ICO
Body: Hi, WeAre token is universal digital asset, which has the following purposes: Payment unit. By using WeAre token, all liquid assets are available for exchange: Bitcoin, Dash, Ethereum, Waves, etc.. Also customers and clients are free to use WeAre token for purchasing services and products inside the ecosystem. It is handy for all WeAre participants because the asset is stable, risks are decreased and the token may be used for purchases not only in one store of developer/project. Also token is an investment tool which grows in price and good for market exchange. Reliable diversification tool. Token’s pricing directly related to amount of successful projects and sold services/products. It is a good asset supplied by real demand. Also security fund will hold token from market fluctuations. Directly indicates success of projects. Good and promising projects because of sales will make influence on token’s quotations. Failure of one project will not make a big influence because success of other projects will cover it.

Author: GGeorge
Title: [ANN][pre-ico]WeAre - Revolution in Helping Investors and Founders with ICO
Body: Hi, WeAre is an ecosystem, which contains amount of tools and services for investors and founders who are going for fundraising by issuing digital assets (tokens or cryptocurrency). The main idea is to give people an opportunity to issue digital assets.

Author: GGeorge
Title: [ANN][pre-ico]WeAre - Revolution in Helping Investors and Founders with ICO
Body: No need to fight for tokens recognition. It dramatically decreases expenses for keeping token serving infrastructure. There is no need in bureaucracy or adding project to listings. Placing tokens on external exchanges is not needed anymore. Developers are working on their product only. High liquidity of token. Risks diversification for investors. ACO is very handy for splitting funding on several rounds. The ecosystem provides ability to cover failure of one project by success of other projects. So, failure will not make a critical financial damage to WeAre token holders. Also, this will happen because the token will still be needed for payments and making investments to other projects.

Customers can buy services and products for one universal WeAre token (inside ecosystem).

Body: Inside the ecosystem will be a network of “WeAre Foundation” branches. In fact, the network will be a property of all ecosystem participants. The main source of profit is micro commissions from all transactions inside WeAre ecosystem.  Support of exchange, financial and reputation balance will be main task in the one line with non-stop involving new business projects to ecosystem.

Author: GGeorge
Title: [ANN][pre-ico]WeAre - Revolution in Helping Investors and Founders with ICO
Body: As payment unit. By using WeAre token, all liquid assets are available for exchange: Bitcoin, Dash, Ethereum, Waves, etc.. Also customers and clients are free to use WeAre token for purchasing services and products inside the ecosystem. It is handy for all WeAre participants because the asset is stable, risks are decreased and the token may be used for purchases not only in one store of developer/project. Also token is an investment tool which grows in price and good for market exchange. As reliable diversification tool. Token’s pricing directly related to amount of successful projects and sold services/products. It is a good asset supplied by real demand. Also security fund will hold token from market fluctuations. Directly indicates success of projects. Good and promising projects because of sales will make influence on token’s quotations. Failure of one project will not make a big influence because success of other projects will cover it.

Author: ArifBestari

Author: GGeorge
Title: [ANN][pre-ico]WeAre - Revolution in Helping Investors and Founders with ICO
Body: WeAre token doesn’t depend on success of one team and project (as it usually happens during regular ICO). In case one team faces failure, the decreased WeAre token pricing will be recovered by success of other projects. It’s important that WeAre token is universal for both funders and investors. Some extra tokens may be used by investors or other participants for purchasing products, services or other financial operations.

Author: varandas
Title: [ANN][pre-ico]WeAre - Revolution in Helping Investors and Founders with ICO
Body: Hello! I like your idea, but there not enough info. How projects will be interacting with each other?

Author: GGeorge
Title: [ANN][pre-ico]WeAre - Revolution in Helping Investors and Founders with ICO
Body: Thanks for your question. They will be interacting in some ways: - WeAre token doesn’t depend on success of one team and project (as it usually happens during regular ICO). In case one team faces failure, the decreased WeAre token pricing will be recovered by success of other projects. - Support from community. Everyone is able to discuss and support projects on WeAre platform. There are no limits for discussion. - Leaders of other WeAre projects or assigned representatives will vote for adding new team and project to WeAre ecosystem. - Access to specialists of platforms. The specialists are representatives of other teams. It is common to provide help and support to each other.

Author: ArifBestari
Title: [ANN][pre-ico]WeAre - Revolution in Helping Investors and Founders with ICO
Body: Hi! If i buy your tokens, how can i use it? Are there additional features?

Author: GGeorge
Title: [ANN][pre-ico]WeAre - Revolution in Helping Investors and Founders with ICO
Body: Hello! Yes, of course. Among them: -Payment unit. By using WeAre token, all liquid assets are available for exchange: Bitcoin, Dash, Ethereum, Waves, etc.. Also customers and clients are free to use WeAre token for purchasing services and products inside the ecosystem. It is handy for all WeAre participants because the asset is stable, risks are decreased and the token may be used for purchases not only in one store of developer/project. Also token is an investment tool which grows in price and good for market exchange. -Reliable diversification tool. Token’s pricing directly related to amount of successful projects and sold services/products. It is a good asset supplied by real demand. Also security fund will hold token from market fluctuations. -Directly indicates success of projects. Good and promising projects because of sales will make influence on token’s quotations. Failure of one project will not make a big influence because success of other projects will cover it. -Additional Coin Offering will be available only in case, when would be projects for that (and smart-contracts as a result). With sometime inflation will be covered by sales.

Author: patrik58

Author: GGeorge
Title: [ANN][pre-ico]WeAre - Revolution in Helping Investors and Founders with ICO
Body: Thanks for your question! WeAre is a place where almost everyone can find something for their interests. Investors are getting good and trustworthy projects and security for their own funds. Risks are dramatically decreased by appearance of new projects inside the ecosystem. More successful projects on the platform mean better cover for project failure.

Author: GGeorge

Body: Hello! We are implementing ACO (Additional Coin Offering). It means that projects may be sponsored not by issuing new token but by additional issuing WeAre token. The additional emission will be purchased by investors and liquid funds will be transferred to teams to fund their projects.

Author: romanzhur
Title: [ANN][pre-ico]WeAre - Revolution in Helping Investors and Founders with ICO
Body: Because it has some interesting nuances, like this:  WeAre Foundation will have coworking space for participants who are already in progress with their project. All needed staff, services and information will be collected in one place and anyone is able to use it. Participants could get private coaching and open lectures provided by specialists from their area. Also they will provide valuable recommendations about projects, which will improve quality and the project’s possibilities.

Author: GGeorge
Title: [ANN][pre-ico]WeAre - Revolution in Helping Investors and Founders with ICO
Body: Yes, you can buy tokens via ETH (link - https://weare.ee/eth.html) or via BTC (link - https://t.me/weareicobot).

Author: GGeorge
Title: [ANN][pre-ico]WeAre - Revolution in Helping Investors and Founders with ICO
Body: -Payment unit. By using WeAre token, all liquid assets are available for exchange: Bitcoin, Dash, Ethereum, Waves, etc.. Also customers and clients are free to use WeAre token for purchasing services and products inside the ecosystem. It is handy for all WeAre participants because the asset is stable, risks are decreased and the token may be used for purchases not only in one store of developer/project. Also token is an investment tool which grows in price and good for market exchange. -Reliable diversification tool. Token’s pricing directly related to amount of successful projects and sold services/products. It is a good asset supplied by real demand. Also security fund will hold token from market fluctuations. -Directly indicates success of projects. Good and promising projects because of sales will make influence on token’s quotations. Failure of one project will not make a big influence because success of other projects will cover it. -Additional Coin Offering will be available only in case, when would be projects for that (and smart-contracts as a result). With sometime inflation will be covered by sales.

Author: yahman
Title: [ANN][pre-ico]WeAre - Revolution in Helping Investors and Founders with ICO
Body: But why Revolution?)) As I can see smth like Bitshares can do the same, no?

Author: GGeorge
Title: [ANN][pre-ico]WeAre - Revolution in Helping Investors and Founders with ICO
Body: Ethereum, Bitcoin, Bitshares today are still best for people, who are going to get funds on ICO. Some their cons: absence of guarantees and ability of complete anonymity of founders. What means ability to avoid any kind of responsibility. Low community involvement and overload by information media sources don’t leave any chances to new and promising projects to get any attention.  Big cons: absence of transactions control and any control of market participants.

Author: GGeorge
Title: [ANN][pre-ico]WeAre - Revolution in Helping Investors and Founders with ICO
Body: - Risk decreasement for investors. WeAre token doesn’t depend on success of one team and project (as it usually happens during regular ICO). In case one team faces failure, the decreased WeAre token pricing will be recovered by success of other projects. It’s important that WeAre token is universal for both funders and investors. Some extra tokens may be used by investors or other participants for purchasing products, services or other financial operations.  - Tokens liquidity will be supplied by real sales of products and services, which are provided by all ecosystem participants.  Investors are getting good and trustworthy projects and security for their own funds.

Author: Jack.Doe333
Title: [ANN][pre-ico]WeAre - Revolution in Helping Investors and Founders with ICO
Body: So, why a team should use the help of yours instead of making ICO by themself?

Author: GGeorge
Title: [ANN][pre-ico]WeAre - Revolution in Helping Investors and Founders with ICO
Body: 1. Support from community. Everyone is able to discuss and support projects on WeAre platform. There are no limits for discussion. By this way developers will get very useful feedback, which may be used for upgrading their product or concept.  2. Access to specialists of platforms. The specialists are representatives of other teams. It is common to provide help and support to each other.  3. Absence of bureaucracy and legal issues. WeAre provides best conditions for team’s and fund performance in legal area.  4. Informational support for projects. Teams no longer have a need to spend insane budgets for pointless bounty campaigns and compete for attention of audience.

Title: [ANN][pre-ico]WeAre - Revolution in Helping Investors and Founders with ICO

Author: GGeorge
Title: [ANN][pre-ico]WeAre - Revolution in Helping Investors and Founders with ICO
Body: Because pre-ICO is conducted without ready-made software and the principle of "exchange cup" is applied, plus the number of coins sold during pre-ICO does not exceed the critical value from the main collection. In addition, there will be a pause between pre-ICO and ICO, during which we will finish the prototype of our blockchain and go to ICO on our own platform.  We believe that we are obliged to give the best possible conditions for those who share our views in the early stages.

Author: romanzhur
Title: [ANN][pre-ico]WeAre - Revolution in Helping Investors and Founders with ICO
Body: How the financing will be carried out?

Author: GGeorge
Title: [ANN][pre-ico]WeAre - Revolution in Helping Investors and Founders with ICO
Body: We are implementing ACO (Additional Coin Offering). It means that projects may be sponsored not by issuing new token but by additional issuing WeAre token. The additional emission will be purchased by investors and liquid funds will be transferred to teams to fund their projects. Funding will be performed by additional issuing of WeAre token, which is reserved directly for specific project. If investors purchase issued soft cap of tokens for launching project, the needed funds are going to the team and they start development. Transfer will be provided by special Escrow service from WeAre Foundation. In other cases issued tokens will be removed and investors will get complete refunding.

Author: retricallos
Title: [ANN][pre-ico]WeAre - Revolution in Helping Investors and Founders with ICO
Body: Who can be a potential client of the system?

Author: GGeorge
Title: [ANN][pre-ico]WeAre - Revolution in Helping Investors and Founders with ICO
Body: We see as our clients:  Projects and teams who are interested in fast and fair funding for start of product development. Investors who used to invest into ICO and know main market’s problems. Investors who are interested in investing to ICO but haven’t done this before. Those who are afraid of possible scams from teams and lack of trustworthy information about projects. Customers can buy services and products for one universal WeAre token (inside ecosystem).

Author: GGeorge
Title: [ANN][pre-ico]WeAre - Revolution in Helping Investors and Founders with ICO
Body: 1. Application will be automatically scored by specific algorithms, which are detecting needed data about project and parameters. 2. Participants of ecosystem (team leaders or CEO of other projects) will vote for adding new team to WeAre ecosystem. More valuable are votes from leaders who are closer to new participants. 3. New emission of WeAre token will be provided directly for development of new project. Investors are purchasing amount of new issued tokens. When the soft cap is reached, teams are starting development. Otherwise the new emission will be removed from ecosystem.

But funding corporations dramatically limited on supporting abilities which would be handy for founders. Also, their requirements to projects are extremely high.  Significant/Important cons of this way of funding: very high percent for using capital.

Author: GGeorge
Title: [ANN][pre-ico]WeAre - Revolution in Helping Investors and Founders with ICO
Body: WeAre branches will be placed in biggest cities all over the world. Staff will be busy by WeAre token support and development. Also they will work on token’s stability and ecosystem. WeAre Foundation’s staff will support launched and finished ACO campaigns.  These specialists will provide management of fund, its usage and splitting. WeAre Foundation will consist of all team leaders of projects or their official representatives as a staff expert. These specialists will support projects, which have passed automatic filtering. Each branch will contain conference hall, auditoriums for beginners and founders.  WeAre Foundation will have coworking space for participants who are already in progress with their project. All needed staff, services and information will be collected in one place and anyone is able to use it. Participants could get private coaching and open lectures provided by specialists from their area. Also they will provide valuable recommendations about projects, which will improve quality and the project’s possibilities.

Transfer will be provided by special Escrow service from WeAre Foundation. In other cases issued tokens will be removed and investors will get complete refunding. Automated preliminary ranking of projects, which filled out application for participation in WeAre ecosystem. Provided data will make a big help in project filtering and after this the projects will be recommended for voting by WeAre members who has some interest in specific production sector.

Author: GGeorge
Title: [ANN][pre-ico]WeAre - Revolution in Helping Investors and Founders with ICO
Body: WeAre token is universal digital asset, which has the following purposes:  Payment unit. By using WeAre token, all liquid assets are available for exchange: Bitcoin, Dash, Ethereum, Waves, etc.. Also customers and clients are free to use WeAre token for purchasing services and products inside the ecosystem. It is handy for all WeAre participants because the asset is stable, risks are decreased and the token may be used for purchases not only in one store of developer/project. Also token is an investment tool which grows in price and good for market exchange. Reliable diversification tool. Token’s pricing directly related to amount of successful projects and sold services/products. It is a good asset supplied by real demand. Also security fund will hold token from market fluctuations. Directly indicates success of projects. Good and promising projects because of sales will make influence on token’s quotations. Failure of one project will not make a big influence because success of other projects will cover it. Additional Coin Offering will be available only in case, when would be projects for that (and smart-contracts as a result). With sometime inflation will be covered by sales.

Author: GGeorge
Title: [ANN][pre-ico]WeAre - Revolution in Helping Investors and Founders with ICO
Body: Risk decreasement for investors. WeAre token doesn’t depend on success of one team and project (as it usually happens during regular ICO). In case one team faces failure, the decreased WeAre token pricing will be recovered by success of other projects. It’s important that WeAre token is universal for both funders and investors. Some extra tokens may be used by investors or other participants for purchasing products, services or other financial operations. -Ability to avoid fraud. -Abscence of commissions for using funds. - Ability to fast get in\out from deals.

Author: GGeorge
Title: [ANN][pre-ico]WeAre - Revolution in Helping Investors and Founders with ICO
Body: Complete fair-dealing. All provided data will be checked by us for authenticity. in any case, the investor makes contribution in WeAre ecosystem and liquidity of token is supplied by success of other projects.  Funding will be performed by additional issuing of WeAre token, which is reserved directly for specific project. If investors purchase issued soft cap of tokens for launching project, the needed funds are going to the team and they start development. Transfer will be provided by special Escrow service from WeAre Foundation. In other cases issued tokens will be removed and investors will get complete refunding.  Risk decreasement for investors. WeAre token doesn’t depend on success of one team and project (as it usually happens during regular ICO). In case one team faces failure, the decreased WeAre token pricing will be recovered by success of other projects. It’s important that WeAre token is universal for both funders and investors. Some extra tokens may be used by investors or other participants for purchasing products, services or other financial operations.

Author: GGeorge
Title: [ANN][pre-ico]WeAre - Revolution in Helping Investors and Founders with ICO
Body: WeAre Corporate advisor is https://coss.io/.  COSS stands for Crypto-One-Stop-Solution and represents a platform, which encompasses all features of a digital economical system based on cryptocurrency. The COSS system consists of a payment gateway / POS, an exchange, a merchant list, market cap rankings, a marketplace, an e-wallet, various coin facilities and a mobile platform.  The COSS platform unifies all transactional aspects that are usually managed by means of FIAT money, and offers multiple cryptocurrency-related services in one place. The list of potential features of the platform can be infinitely extended, and will continue growing as the platform evolves.

Author: Abdelmajid1
Title: [ANN][pre-ico]WeAre - Revolution in Helping Investors and Founders with ICO
Body: what is the basic idea of your project?

Author: GGeorge
Title: [ANN][pre-ico]WeAre - Revolution in Helping Investors and Founders with ICO
Body: WeAre is an ecosystem, which contains amount of tools and services for investors and founders who are going for fundraising by issuing digital assets (tokens or cryptocurrency).  Created concept is a solution for investors, founders and specialists that dramatically decreases mentioned problems.  We are implementing ACO (Additional Coin Offering). It means that projects may be sponsored not by issuing new token but by additional issuing WeAre token. The additional emission will be purchased by investors and liquid funds will be transferred to teams to fund their projects.

Author: Abdelmajid1
Title: [ANN][pre-ico]WeAre - Revolution in Helping Investors and Founders with ICO
Body: So is it a kind of platform where investors, founders and specialists meet to interact further and exchange their tools for common benefit? Or WeAre has its own amount of tools and services for them?

Author: Samu10
Title: [ANN][pre-ico]WeAre - Revolution in Helping Investors and Founders with ICO
Body: what problem of your customers are you trying to solve?

Author: GGeorge
Title: [ANN][pre-ico]WeAre - Revolution in Helping Investors and Founders with ICO
Body: No need to fight for tokens recognition. It dramatically decreases expenses for keeping token serving infrastructure. There is no need in bureaucracy or adding project to listings. Placing tokens on external exchanges is not needed anymore. Developers are working on their product only. High liquidity of token. Risks diversification for investors. ACO is very handy for splitting funding on several rounds. The ecosystem provides ability to cover failure of one project by success of other projects. So, failure will not make a critical financial damage to WeAre token holders. Also, this will happen because the token will still be needed for payments and making investments to other projects.

Author: GGeorge
Title: [ANN][pre-ico]WeAre - Revolution in Helping Investors and Founders with ICO
Body: Fundraised money will be used for completing ecosystem’s functionality and opening of main WeAre office and one branch in addition (depends on amount of funds reached on Pre-ICO). When Pre-ICO is over, we are going to launch a few ACO for the projects. Meanwhile two ICOs will be issued with additional amount of WeAre tokens according to portions of new projects in blockchain ecosystem.  After that ACO will be provided for next 10-20 projects on WeAre platform, which means additional issue of WeAre token.

Author: GGeorge
Title: [ANN][pre-ico]WeAre - Revolution in Helping Investors and Founders with ICO
Body: -Payment unit. By using WeAre token, all liquid assets are available for exchange: Bitcoin, Dash, Ethereum, Waves, etc.. Also customers and clients are free to use WeAre token for purchasing services and products inside the ecosystem. It is handy for all WeAre participants because the asset is stable, risks are decreased and the token may be used for purchases not only in one store of developer/project. Also token is an investment tool which grows in price and good for market exchange. -Reliable diversification tool. Token’s pricing directly related to amount of successful projects and sold services/products. It is a good asset supplied by real demand. Also security fund will hold token from market fluctuations. -Directly indicates success of projects. Good and promising projects because of sales will make influence on token’s quotations. Failure of one project will not make a big influence because success of other projects will cover it. -Additional Coin Offering will be available only in case, when would be projects for that (and smart-contracts as a result). With sometime inflation will be covered by sales.

Author: GGeorge
Title: [ANN][pre-ico]WeAre - Revolution in Helping Investors and Founders with ICO
Body: We are implementing ACO (Additional Coin Offering). It means that projects may be sponsored not by issuing new token but by additional issuing WeAre token. The additional emission will be purchased by investors and liquid funds will be transferred to teams to fund their projects.

Author: GGeorge
Title: [ANN][pre-ico]WeAre - Revolution in Helping Investors and Founders with ICO
Body: WeAre is not just another blockchain or fund that provides token issue and projects supporting. It is a complete ecosystem, where success of each project increases portfolio value of all token holder. By this way all team leaders are interested in success of all projects and will provide all available help by advices or providing staff or funds for solving some issues.

Author: GGeorge
Title: [ANN][pre-ico]WeAre - Revolution in Helping Investors and Founders with ICO
Body: We are implementing ACO (Additional Coin Offering). It means that projects may be sponsored not by issuing new token but by additional issuing WeAre token. The additional emission will be purchased by investors and liquid funds will be transferred to teams to fund their projects.

Author: GGeorge
Title: [ANN][pre-ico]WeAre - Revolution in Helping Investors and Founders with ICO
Body: We see as our clients:  Projects and teams who are interested in fast and fair funding for start of product development. Investors who used to invest into ICO and know main market’s problems. Investors who are interested in investing to ICO but haven’t done this before. Those who are afraid of possible scams from teams and lack of trustworthy information about projects. Customers can buy services and products for one universal WeAre token (inside ecosystem).

Besides that, all teams will have a special staff member named “specialist of exchange balance holder, quality assurance and voting according new project’s application”. He will be permanent team member of each team and represents interests of WeAre ecosystem. He is obligated to provide consulting and mentorship to all projects who requires that. We are expecting that he will combine this work with obligations of own project’s CEO, which are fundraising on WeAre ecosystem.

Author: romanzhur
Title: [ANN][pre-ico]WeAre - Revolution in Helping Investors and Founders with ICO
Body: - Suspicious Escrow services and Advisors like unreliable people and companies who ask for a huge percent (usually up to 10% from investors and sometimes even from entrepreneurs). Sometimes they even require prepayment or purchasing subscription for performing a deal between investor and founders. Advisors are sometimes not real specialists from some sector and don’t provide needed help for projects. They are getting paid just because advisor is a “musthave” for projects and kind of guarantee team’s confidence.  - Informational campaigns. The more projects are in the market, the harder it is to promote them and marketing/PR campaigns are getting much more aggressive. A Good team and project can lose just because other people have made more contributions in purchasing articles and content. In fact, advertising and public relations don’t guarantee that a/the project is good at real.  - Team’s complectation. Quite often a team doesn’t have specialists so development may be stuck because of this reason.  - Usually platforms don’t care about projects made on their blockchain.

Author: GGeorge
Title: [ANN][pre-ico]WeAre - Revolution in Helping Investors and Founders with ICO
Body: Primarily, this is the automated scoring of the founders by the banking principle, and then the evaluation of the project itself.

Author: GGeorge
Title: [ANN][pre-ico]WeAre - Revolution in Helping Investors and Founders with ICO
Body: Yes. WeAre branches will be placed in biggest cities all over the world. Staff will be busy by WeAre token support and development. Also they will work on token’s stability and ecosystem. WeAre Foundation’s staff will support launched and finished ACO campaigns.  These specialists will provide management of fund, its usage and splitting. WeAre Foundation will consist of all team leaders of projects or their official representatives as a staff expert. These specialists will support projects, which have passed automatic filtering. Each branch will contain conference hall, auditoriums for beginners and founders.

Body: Tell me pls, why a team should pick yor project for ICO instead of making it by themself?

Author: GGeorge
Title: [ANN][pre-ico]WeAre - Revolution in Helping Investors and Founders with ICO
Body: 1. Support from community. Everyone is able to discuss and support projects on WeAre platform. There are no limits for discussion. By this way developers will get very useful feedback, which may be used for upgrading their product or concept.  2. Access to specialists of platforms. The specialists are representatives of other teams. It is common to provide help and support to each other.  3. Absence of bureaucracy and legal issues. WeAre provides best conditions for team’s and fund performance in legal area.  4. Informational support for projects. Teams no longer have a need to spend insane budgets for pointless bounty campaigns and compete for attention of audience.

Author: GGeorge
Title: [ANN][pre-ico]WeAre - Revolution in Helping Investors and Founders with ICO
Body: WeAre token is universal digital asset, which has the following purposes:  Payment unit. By using WeAre token, all liquid assets are available for exchange: Bitcoin, Dash, Ethereum, Waves, etc.. Also customers and clients are free to use WeAre token for purchasing services and products inside the ecosystem. It is handy for all WeAre participants because the asset is stable, risks are decreased and the token may be used for purchases not only in one store of developer/project. Also token is an investment tool which grows in price and good for market exchange. Reliable diversification tool. Token’s pricing directly related to amount of successful projects and sold services/products. It is a good asset supplied by real demand. Also security fund will hold token from market fluctuations. Directly indicates success of projects. Good and promising projects because of sales will make influence on token’s quotations. Failure of one project will not make a big influence because success of other projects will cover it. Additional Coin Offering will be available only in case, when would be projects for that (and smart-contracts as a result). With sometime inflation will be covered by sales.

Author: GGeorge
Title: [ANN][pre-ico]WeAre - Revolution in Helping Investors and Founders with ICO
Body: We are implementing ACO (Additional Coin Offering). It means that projects may be sponsored not by issuing new token but by additional issuing WeAre token. The additional emission will be purchased by investors and liquid funds will be transferred to teams to fund their projects. Funding will be performed by additional issuing of WeAre token, which is reserved directly for specific project. If investors purchase issued soft cap of tokens for launching project, the needed funds are going to the team and they start development. Transfer will be provided by special Escrow service from WeAre Foundation. In other cases issued tokens will be removed and investors will get complete refunding.

Author: GGeorge
Title: [ANN][pre-ico]WeAre - Revolution in Helping Investors and Founders with ICO
Body: Tokens liquidity will be supplied by real sales of products and services, which are provided by all ecosystem participants.

Author: GGeorge
Title: [ANN][pre-ico]WeAre - Revolution in Helping Investors and Founders with ICO
Body: -Payment unit. By using WeAre token, all liquid assets are available for exchange: Bitcoin, Dash, Ethereum, Waves, etc.. Also customers and clients are free to use WeAre token for purchasing services and products inside the ecosystem. It is handy for all WeAre participants because the asset is stable, risks are decreased and the token may be used for purchases not only in one store of developer/project. Also token is an investment tool which grows in price and good for market exchange. -Reliable diversification tool. Token’s pricing directly related to amount of successful projects and sold services/products. It is a good asset supplied by real demand. Also security fund will hold token from market fluctuations. -Directly indicates success of projects. Good and promising projects because of sales will make influence on token’s quotations. Failure of one project will not make a big influence because success of other projects will cover it. -Additional Coin Offering will be available only in case, when would be projects for that (and smart-contracts as a result). With sometime inflation will be covered by sales.

Author: GGeorge
Title: [ANN][pre-ico]WeAre - Revolution in Helping Investors and Founders with ICO
Body: WeAre Corporate advisor is https://coss.io/.  COSS stands for Crypto-One-Stop-Solution and represents a platform, which encompasses all features of a digital economical system based on cryptocurrency. The COSS system consists of a payment gateway / POS, an exchange, a merchant list, market cap rankings, a marketplace, an e-wallet, various coin facilities and a mobile platform.  The COSS platform unifies all transactional aspects that are usually managed by means of FIAT money, and offers multiple cryptocurrency-related services in one place. The list of potential features of the platform can be infinitely extended, and will continue growing as the platform evolves.

WeAre Foundation’s staff will support launched and finished ACO campaigns.  These specialists will provide management of fund, its usage and splitting. WeAre Foundation will consist of all team leaders of projects or their official representatives as a staff expert. These specialists will support projects, which have passed automatic filtering. Author: AshleyAshes
Title: [ANN][pre-ico]WeAre - Revolution in Helping Investors and Founders with ICO
Body: Very interesting project but what makes the your token unique?

Author: GGeorge
Title: [ANN][pre-ico]WeAre - Revolution in Helping Investors and Founders with ICO
Body: Our project uniquenesses are: - No need to fight for tokens recognition for our system users. - There is no need in bureaucracy or adding project to listings. Placing tokens on external exchanges is not needed anymore. Developers are working on their product only. - High liquidity of token. Tokens liquidity will be supplied by real sales of products and services, which are provided by all ecosystem participants. - Risks diversification for investors. The ecosystem provides ability to cover failure of one project by success of other projects. So, failure will not make a critical financial damage to WeAre token holders. Also, this will happen because the token will still be needed for payments and making investments to other projects. - ACO is very handy for splitting funding on several rounds. - Informational and promotional support for projects. Teams no longer have a need to spend insane budgets for pointless bounty campaigns and compete for attention of audience. - Access to specialists of platforms.

Author: GGeorge
Title: [ANN][pre-ico]WeAre - Revolution in Helping Investors and Founders with ICO
Body: -Payment unit. By using WeAre token, all liquid assets are available for exchange: Bitcoin, Dash, Ethereum, Waves, etc.. Also customers and clients are free to use WeAre token for purchasing services and products inside the ecosystem. It is handy for all WeAre participants because the asset is stable, risks are decreased and the token may be used for purchases not only in one store of developer/project. Also token is an investment tool which grows in price and good for market exchange. -Reliable diversification tool. Token’s pricing directly related to amount of successful projects and sold services/products. It is a good asset supplied by real demand. Also security fund will hold token from market fluctuations. -Directly indicates success of projects. Good and promising projects because of sales will make influence on token’s quotations. Failure of one project will not make a big influence because success of other projects will cover it. -Additional Coin Offering will be available only in case, when would be projects for that (and smart-contracts as a result). With sometime inflation will be covered by sales.

Author: sartredd
Title: [ANN][pre-ico]WeAre - Revolution in Helping Investors and Founders with ICO

Author: mariam.maryana
Title: [ANN][pre-ico]WeAre - Revolution in Helping Investors and Founders with ICO
Body: WeAre token doesn’t depend on success of one team and project (as it usually happens during regular ICO). In case one team faces failure, the decreased WeAre token pricing will be recovered by success of other projects. It’s important that WeAre token is universal for both funders and investors. Some extra tokens may be used by investors or other participants for purchasing products, services or other financial operations.

Author: mariam.maryana
Title: [ANN][pre-ico]WeAre - Revolution in Helping Investors and Founders with ICO
Body: We are implementing ACO (Additional Coin Offering). It means that projects may be sponsored not by issuing new token but by additional issuing WeAre token. The additional emission will be purchased by investors and liquid funds will be transferred to teams to fund their projects.

Author: mariam.maryana
Title: [ANN][pre-ico]WeAre - Revolution in Helping Investors and Founders with ICO
Body: Teams no longer have a need to spend insane budgets for pointless bounty campaigns and compete for attention of audience. Our resources will allow provide best informational performance by sharing promoting information and keeping in touch with interested audience. Each new project (and smart-contract as a result with soft cap) will require less funding in development of media sources because new project means new high quality media event and increasing involved audience.

Title: [ANN][pre-ico]WeAre - Revolution in Helping Investors and Founders with ICO
Body: We see as our clients:  Projects and teams who are interested in fast and fair funding for start of product development. Investors who used to invest into ICO and know main market’s problems. Investors who are interested in investing to ICO but haven’t done this before. Those who are afraid of possible scams from teams and lack of trustworthy information about projects. Customers can buy services and products for one universal WeAre token (inside ecosystem).

Author: Fritz93
Title: [ANN][pre-ico]WeAre - Revolution in Helping Investors and Founders with ICO
Body: A computer algorithm designed to conclude and maintain self-executing contracts performed in a blocking environment. Smart contracts enable you to perform reliable and confidential transactions without the involvement of external intermediaries in the face of banks or government agencies. In addition, such transactions are traceable, transparent and irreversible. Smart contracts not only contain information about the obligations of the parties and sanctions for their violation, but they automatically ensure the fulfillment of all the terms of the contract.
